name: Dartrix

evolution.description: Dartrix can evolve into Decidueye at level 13 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Blade Quill Pokémon. This narcissistic Pokémon is a clean freak. If you don’t groom it diligently, it will stop listening to you.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Long Reach
abilities.description: This Pokémon has an additional 5 feet of reach with all melee attacks and Attacks of Opportunity.
